name: reveal-pug-scss-starter
description: A simple Reveal.js server with Pug and SCSS

scripts.rmdir: node -e "var fs = require('fs'); try{process.argv.slice(1).map((fpath) => fs.rmdirSync(fpath, { recursive: true }))}catch(err){console.log('Folder not found, could not delete it.')}; process.exit(0);"

author: Martijn De Jongh
